verses.verse: The Spirit distinctly says that in later times some people will stay away from the trust, paying attention to misleading spirits and instructions of demons,
in faked behavior of lying people, who have been scarred in their own conscience,

who hinder people to be marrying, for them to be keeping themselves away from foods that God created for receiving with thankfulness by the trusting people and people who have correctly understood the truth,
because every created thing of God is nice and nothing being received with thankfulness is trash.
You see, it is made sacred through God's message and intervention.
Putting these things under the brothers, you will be a nice servant of Jesus, the Anointed King, nurtured in the messages of the trust and the nice instruction that you have followed alongside.
Refuse the profane and old wives' myths. Strenuously exercise yourself toward godliness.
You see, the strenuous bodily exercise is beneficial toward a few things, but the godliness is beneficial toward everything, having a promise of the life now and the life that is going to be.
The message is trustable and deserving of every bit of acceptance.
You see, for this we also labor and are insulted, because we have anticipated good based on the living God who is a rescuer of all kinds of people, especially trusting people.
Pass these orders on and teach them.
No one must ignore you because of your youth. But become an example of the trusting people in message, in behavior, in love, in spirit, in trust, in consecration.
Until I come, pay attention to the reading, the encouragement, the instruction.
Don't stop caring for the gift in you that was given to you through preaching with the laying on of the hands of the board of older men.
Care for these things. Be in these things so that your progress may be shown in everyone.
Be attentive to yourself and the instruction. Stay over in them. You see, doing this, you will rescue both yourself and the people listening to you.
